Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Evenia Monte Alba in Benasque, you'll be near ski lifts and convenient to Cerler Ski Resort. This family-friendly hotel is within the region of Lago de Creguena and Aneto.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 127 guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy the convenience of ski-in/ski-out access at this hotel, which also features an outdoor pool and a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and supervised childcare/activities.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Evenia Monte Alba. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Evenia Monte Alba. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.

When you stay at Evenia Monte Alba in Benasque, you'll be near ski lifts and convenient to Cerler Ski Resort. This family-friendly hotel is within the region of Lago de Creguena and Aneto.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Cerler Ski Resort - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Lago de Creguena - 8.7 km / 5.4 mi
Aneto - 10.7 km / 6.6 mi
Roda de Isabena Cathedral - 33.1 km / 20.6 mi
Ordesa Y Monte Perdido National Park - 52.4 km / 32.5 mi
Bodegas Raso Huete - 64.4 km / 40 mi
Bodegas Enate - 65.9 km / 40.9 mi
Bodegas Olvena - 66.7 km / 41.4 mi
Panticosa Ski Resort - 68.5 km / 42.6 mi
Bodegas Lalanne - 69.4 km / 43.1 mi
Bodega Blecua - 69.4 km / 43.1 mi
Bodega Vinas del Vero - 69.4 km / 43.2 mi
Bodega Pirineos - 69.6 km / 43.3 mi
Plaza del Mercado - 70.3 km / 43.7 mi
Barbastro City Hall - 70.4 km / 43.7 mi

The preferred airport for Evenia Monte Alba is Gerona (GRO-Costa Brava) - 198.6 km / 123.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.

Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
